word: THESE COUNSELS ARE AMONG THOSE GIVEN THE BELIEVER, DEALING WITH A SIGNIFICANT AND FAR-REACHING EXPERIENCE IN LIFE AND PRESENTING A COURSE OF ACTION LEAST FRAUGHT WITH FACTORS THAT MAY LEAD TO HEARTACHES AND COULD IMPAIR OR DESTROY THE UNION. AS ELLEN WHITE SAYS, "JESUS WANTS TO SEE HAPPY MARRIAGES, HAPPY FIRESIDES."
